AccountContactRole.name: AccountContactRole
AccountContactRole.description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on an Account.

ContactId.description: Required. ID of the Contact associated with this account.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

IsPrimary.description: Specifies whether the Contact plays the primary role on the Account (true) or not (false). Note that each account has only one primary contact role. Label is Primary. Default value is false.

Role.description: Name of the role played by the Contact on this Account, such as Decision Maker, Approver, Buyer, and so on. Must be uniqueâ€”there can't be multiple records in which the AccountId, ContactId, and Role values are identical. Different contacts can play the same role on the same account. A contact can play different roles on the same account.
